parameter_calculations.py¶

A module for calculating parameters to be used in ncsd run files, using manual parameters.

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.Ngs_func(Z, N)¶

Calculates Ngs: number of excitations in the ground state

I didn’t want to call this function Ngs, so I could use Ngs as a variable later.

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.Nmin_HO(Z)¶

Helper function for Ngs_func

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.calc_params(run_dir, paths, man_params, default_params, machine)¶

Calculates all parameters needed for an NCSD run, using manual parameters input by the user (man_params) and a set of default_params.

  • run_dir = the directory where the files will be stored

  • paths = list containing - interaction files directory - path to ncsd executable - path to output_plotter module

Returns MFDPParams, BatchParams objects, to be written into a folder for an NCSD run.

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.nucleus(Z, N)¶

Returns the name of a nucleus in ‘Li8’ style
